Title: The Changeling
Writer: Russell Hunter (story by), William Gray (screenplay by), Diana Maddox (screenplay by)
Actors: George C. Scott, Trish Van Devere, Melvyn Douglas, Jean Marsh
Plot: After the death of his wife and daughter in a car crash, a music professor staying at an old mansion is dragged into a decades-old mystery by an inexplicable presence in the mansion's attic.
